TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi beforefieldinit Context extends System.Object

summary.span: 定義物件所在，而且可以對其強制套用原則的環境。

span.span: Defines an environment for the objects that are resident inside it and for which a policy can be enforced.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容是已排序的屬性，定義物件所在的環境。A context is an ordered sequence of properties that define an environment for the objects resident inside it. 內容會被設定來要求特定自動服務，例如同步處理、 交易、-just-in-time 啟動、 安全性和等等的物件的啟用程序期間建立。Contexts get created during the activation process for objects that are configured to require certain automatic services, such as synchronization, transactions, just-in-time activation, security, and so on. 同一個內容可包含多個物件。Multiple objects can live inside a context. 類別會標示的執行個體類別，可提供使用規則。Classes are marked with an instance of the class, which provides the usage rules. 每當新的物件具現化，.NET Framework 尋找相容的或建立的新執行個體物件類別。Whenever a new object is instantiated, the .NET Framework finds a compatible or creates a new instance of the class for the object. 一旦物件放在內容中，它會保持在其生命週期。Once an object is placed in a context, it stays in it for life. 可以繫結至內容的類別稱為內容繫結類別。Classes that can be bound to a context are called context-bound classes. 當從另一個內容存取，這類類別會參考直接使用 proxy。When accessed from another context, such classes are referenced directly by using a proxy. 另一個內容中的物件從一個內容中任何呼叫會瀏覽內容的 proxy，並受到合併的內容屬性強制執行原則。Any call from an object in one context to an object in another context will go through a context proxy and be affected by the policy that the combined context properties enforce. 將新物件的內容通常會選擇根據類別上的中繼資料屬性。A new object's context is generally chosen based on meta-data attributes on the class. 這項機制可透過自訂屬性。This mechanism is extensible through custom attributes. 這些是已知為靜態內容屬性，這樣會編譯成類別中繼資料。These are known as static-context properties, which are compiled into the class meta-data. 動態內容屬性 （也稱為組態屬性） 可以套用，並由系統管理員設定。Dynamic-context properties (also known as configuration properties) can be applied and configured by administrators. 如需有關內容的詳細資訊，請參閱[界限：處理序和應用程式定義域](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kt21t9h7(v=vs.100))。For more information on contexts, see [Boundaries: Processes and Application Domains](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kt21t9h7(v=vs.100)).

A local data slot object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有的內容上配置的位置。The slot is allocated on all the contexts. 具名的資料插槽是公用的任何人都可以管理。Named data slots are public and can be manipulated by anyone.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DefaultContext As Context

summary.span: 取得目前應用程式定義域的預設內容。

span.span: Gets the default context for the current application domain.
The default context for the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為其未明確設定內容的應用程式定義域中的每個執行緒會被視為預設內容中執行。Every thread in an application domain for which a context is not explicitly set is considered to be running in the default context.

param.name: deleg
param.span: 用來要求回呼 (Callback) 的委派。

span.span: The delegate used to request the callback.

summary.span: 在另一個內容中執行程式碼。

span.span: Executes code in another context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 回呼可藉由呼叫它藉由傳入委派的方法。A callback can be done by calling the method on it by passing in a delegate. 委派用來要求回呼。The delegate is used to request a callback. 必須是委派類別型別。The delegate must be a class type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 清除非預設內容的支援物件。

span.span: Cleans up the backing objects for the nondefault contexts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設內容備份物件會清除在關閉期間向下的類別。For default contexts, backing objects are cleaned up during shut down of the class.

summary.span: 凍結內容，使任何人都無法在目前的內容中加入或移除屬性。

span.span: Freezes the context, making it impossible to add or remove context properties from the current context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後的內容已凍結，則無法新增內容屬性。Context properties cannot be added after the context has been frozen.

span.span: The context is already frozen.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool RegisterDynamicProperty (System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IDynamicProperty prop, ContextBoundObject obj, System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context ctx);

.method public static hidebysig bool RegisterDynamicProperty(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IDynamicProperty prop, class System.ContextBoundObject obj, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context ctx) cil managed
Public Shared Function RegisterDynamicProperty (prop As IDynamicProperty, obj As ContextBoundObject, ctx As Context) As Boolean
public: static bool RegisterDynamicProperty(System::Runtime::Remoting::Contexts::IDynamicProperty ^ prop, ContextBoundObject ^ obj, System::Runtime::Remoting::Contexts::Context ^ ctx);
static member RegisterDynamicProperty : System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IDynamicProperty * ContextBoundObject * System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context -> bool

span.span: The dynamic property to register.

param.name: obj
param.span: 已註冊 property 的物件/Proxy。

span.span: The object/proxy for which the property is registered.

param.name: ctx
param.span: 已註冊 property 的內容。

span.span: The context for which the property is registered.

summary.span: 向遠端服務註冊實作 介面的動態屬性 (Dynamic Property)。

span.span: Registers a dynamic property implementing the interface with the remoting service.

returns.span: 如果屬性註冊成功，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the property was successfully registered; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據`obj`並`ctx`，`prop`要求參與位於路徑中的遠端呼叫的某個位置的接收。Based on `obj` and `ctx`, `prop` is asked to contribute a sink that is placed at some location in the path of remoting calls. 如果註冊多個屬性，會呼叫其接收，可以呼叫之間變更以任意順序。If multiple properties are registered, their sinks will be called in an arbitrary order that can change between calls. 如果`obj`不是`null`，，然後如果它是 proxy 時，會攔截在 proxy 上所做的所有呼叫。If `obj` is not `null`, and then if it is a proxy, all calls made on the proxy are intercepted. 否則，如果`obj`是真正的物件，物件上的所有呼叫都被都攔截。Otherwise, if `obj` is a real object, all calls on the object are intercepted. `ctx`參數必須是`null`。The `ctx` parameter must be `null`. 如果`ctx`不是`null`，`obj`必須是`null`和攔截進入和離開內容的所有呼叫。If `ctx` is not `null`, `obj` must be `null` and all calls entering and leaving the context are intercepted. 如果兩個`ctx`並`obj`是`null`，攔截所有的呼叫進入和離開所有內容。If both `ctx` and `obj` are `null`, all calls entering and leaving all contexts are intercepted.

exception.span: 或其名稱為 ，或不是動態屬性 (未實作 )。

span.span: Either or its name is , or it is not dynamic (it does not implement ).

exception.span: 已同時指定物件和內容 ( 和 都不是 )。

span.span: Both an object as well as a context are specified (both and are not ).

permission.span: 針對插入的 CLR 基礎結構中的程式碼。

span.span: for plugging code into the CLR infrastructure.
